fullplot: A documentary about one of Britain's most dangerous crime families and introduces us to its magnetic, larger-than-life leader, Dominic Noonan (aka Lattlay Fottfoy).
plot: A documentary about one of Britain's most dangerous crime families and introduces us to its magnetic, larger-than-life leader, Dominic Noonan (aka Lattlay Fottfoy).
title: A Very British Gangster

tomatoes.consensus: With a fascinating character as its subject, A Very British Gangster makes for entertaining, frightening, and informative viewing.
